data.title: La Poesía de Vicente Aleixandre
data.meta_description: Madrid: Biblioteca Románica Hispánica / Editorial Gredos, 1968 . Second Edition Corregida y Aumentada Octavo 20cm. ; original white card wrappers printed in red and blue; 485, 8 pp. Minor shelf wear, corners gently bumped, spine a bit toned, else a Very Good, unopened copy. Study of the poetry of Vicente Aleixandre 1898-1984 , who would be awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature
data.text:
Madrid: Biblioteca Románica Hispánica / Editorial Gredos, [1968]. Second Edition "Corregida y Aumentada" Octavo (20cm.); original white card wrappers printed in red and blue; 485,[8]pp. Minor shelf wear, corners gently bumped, spine a bit toned, else a Very Good, unopened copy. Study of the poetry of Vicente Aleixandre (1898-1984), who would be awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1977.

Price: $35.00
